title: Assumed that individual described as supertaster

content.question: It can be assumed that an individual described as a supertaster

choices.label: represents a majority of the United States population
has a low density of taste buds on the tongue
is very sensitive to hot peppers

content.answer: is very sensitive to hot peppers

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
